# Obsidian Bullets
## Overview
**Price**: 10 sp

**Weight**: —

## Description
These stones are little more than ideally sized obsidian shards. Throwing or loading a weapon with an obsidian bullet deals 1 point of slashing damage if the wielder is not wearing a gauntlet or happens to have no skin to cut, like a skeleton or [[Dødelig|dødelig]]. An attack with an obsidian bullet deals slashing damage on a successful hit and adds +1 to the damage roll.
